Zeb Tsikira bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Canada, onye edemede, onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka na onye na-emepụta egwu.
A mụrụ Zeb Tsikira na Bulawayo ebe o tolitere na mpaghara Nketa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Manondwane Primary School na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Hamilton Boys High
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Canada n'afọ 2001.
N'afọ 2010, Tsikira hapụrụ mahadum ebe ọ na-amụ akparamaagwa na Mahadum nke Ottawa

O guzobere Canvestus Group na Nyon Communications 2013 nke o ji bụrụ onye ọchụnta ego ama ama na mmepe ala na ụlọ. A họpụtara Tsikira ma mata ya na Zimbabwe Achievers Awards 2019 dị ka onye ọchụnta ego nwoke kachasị mma nke afọ.
